name: apgar
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool clinicalmarkers.
Tool description: Easy calculation of clinical markers for medical applications.
API description: Makes a request to the APGAR scoring API and returns the observation result in JSON format.

skincolorscore.description: Score for the baby's skin color.

heartrateinbpm.description: Heart rate of the baby in beats per minute.

responsetoirritablestimuliscore.description: Score for the baby's response to irritable stimuli.

activityscore.description: Score for the baby's muscle tone and activity.
